title: IREN Announces Pricing of Ordinary Shares Offering to Fund the Repurchase of Convertible Notes
description: NEW YORK, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- IREN Limited (NASDAQ: IREN) (“IREN”) today announced the pricing of a registered direct offering of 39,699,102 ordinary shares at a price of $41.12 per share (the “Offering”) to a limited number of purchasers. The O…
